plot outline: This youthful romantic action movie follows the fluctuating fortunes of Keeri, who makes his living by stealing. After his guardian angel commits suicide, he finds out that she had been raped. He seeks revenge and kills the man responsible. On the run from police, he and his lover Sandhya go to Durai for help. Will it be happily-ever-after for the star-crossed lovers?
